These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column2: Allow  to manage Announcements of Circles?

Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their circle. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view circles.

Your members will be asked to provide some information about their circle information when creating a new circle. Create some circle questions that allow them to describe their circle in a way that relates to the theme of your community. To reorder the circle questions, click on their names and drag them up or down.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post to their circle discussions. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can upload photos to their circles. If you do not check any options, all members will be allowed to upload.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can create events in their circles. If you do not check any options, all members will be allowed to create events.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can create polls in their circles. If you do not check any options, all members will be allowed to create polls.

column1: Are you sure you want to delete the selected groups?
column2: Are you sure you want to delete the selected circles?

This page lists all of the circle entries your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these circles and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific circle entries. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the circle entries on your social network.

If you want to allow your users to categorize their circles, create the categories below. This feature is useful if you want to list all your users' circle that If you have no categories, your users will not be given the option of assigning a circle category.
This page lists all of the report entries your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor and moderate activities of circles easily.

column1: Are you sure that you want to delete this category? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.

This email is sent to the member when they are approved to join a circle.
You have been approved to join the circle [object_title]

[header]

You have been approved to join the circle "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when someone requests to join their circle.
[sender_title] has requested to join the circle [object_title]

[header]

[sender_title] has requested to join the circle "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when people reply to discussion topics that the member created.
A member has posted a reply to your topic "[object_title]" in the circle "[object_parent_title]"

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a reply to your topic "[object_title]" in the circle "[object_parent_title]":

"[message]"

Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when people reply to discussion topics that the member replied to.
A member has posted a reply to the topic "[object_title]" you replied to in the circle "[object_parent_title]"

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a reply to the topic "[object_title]" you replied to in the circle "[object_parent_title]":

"[message]"

Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when they are invited to a circle.
You have been invited to join the circle [object_title]

[header]

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]

You have been promoted to officer in the circle [object_title]

[header]

You have been promoted to officer in the circle "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent when members invite their friends to join during the signup process.
You have received an invitation to join our social network and the circle [group_title]!

[header]

"[message]"

To join, please follow the link below:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent when members cancel the circle owner invitation to join circle.
You have received a cancel invitation to join our social network and the circle [group_title]!

[header]

You have received a cancel invitation to join our social network and the circle [group_title]

To view the circle, please follow the link below:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]

Announcements are a great way to keep your members engaged in the community. Announcements appear inside the "Announcement Widget", which you can place anywhere on your site. By default, this widget appears at the top of the member homepage - this way, members see your announcements right when they sign in. You can move this widget elsewhere or change its settings in the Layout Editor.
